##HW1-8

```{r}
compute_s_n <- function(n) {
  sum <- 0
  for (i in 1:n) {
    sum <- sum + i^2
  }
  return(sum)
}

s_n <- vector("numeric", 25)
for (i in 1:25){
  s_n[i] <- compute_s_n(i)
}
print(s_n)

s_n <- sapply(1:25, compute_s_n)
print(s_n)

compute_s_n <- function(n) {
  sum <- 0
  for (i in 1:n) {
    sum <- sum + i^2
  }
  sum_formula <- n * (n + 1) * (2 * n + 1) / 6
  return(list(calculate = sum, accurate = sum_formula))
}
result <- compute_s_n(10)
print(result)
```
